sentences.english: It is the custom here to take a cold shower every evening in summer.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天每天傍晚洗冷水浴是這裏的習俗。

sentences.english: Each day I live, the grace you give.
sentences.chinese: 每天的生活，禰都賜下恩典。

sentences.english: Like living in the mountains from the solitary who had every day.
sentences.chinese: 像躲避在深山老林居住的獨行者過每天。

sentences.english: The Beijing South Railway Station sees around fifty thousand passengers departing every day.
sentences.chinese: 北京南站每天有將近5萬客流量。

sentences.english: Get a book of positive , inspirational thoughts and keep it by your desk or by your pillow. Read one or two passages each day.
sentences.chinese: 桌上或案頭擺放着一本勵志書，每天都去朗讀一兩段。

sentences.english: Do you do homework every day?
sentences.chinese: 你們每天都做家庭作業嗎？

sentences.english: This will help on days that you don’t feel like cooking.
sentences.chinese: 這樣每天下來你就不會覺得自己在煮飯了。

sentences.english: The restaurant receives hundreds of customers every day.
sentences.chinese: 這家飯店每天接待數以百計的顧客。

sentences.english: If you do one thing each day, you'll reach your goal.
sentences.chinese: 如果你每天都做一件事，你會達到你的目標的。

sentences.english: After each day I would just put the sweaty clothes into the same bag.
sentences.chinese: 每天偶都把汗滋滋的球衣放到包裏。

sentences.english: The play ball for 1 hour every day.
sentences.chinese: 他們打球打了一個鐘頭每天。

sentences.english: Fig1. Paper is staple food supposing office is restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 如果辦公室是個餐館，紙應該是每天消耗最多的主食。

sentences.english: Peformances are many times on everyday.
sentences.chinese: 唱聖歌的表演每天都有很多次。

sentences.english: The man spent every afternoon on her six-meter wide garden.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人每天下午都在她的花園裏。

sentences.english: We had better take less than 65 grammes fat every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天攝入的脂肪量最好不要超過65克。

sentences.english: And then, Hu Yin comes here every evening.
sentences.chinese: 於是，胡公子每天晚上都來。

definition: to leave early and return late (idiom)
regardless of weather conditions/rain, hail or shine
to get out of bed/to get up
to have three meals a day
to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
